surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

sentences.english: So, now we could very well to this in rectangular coordinates if we want.
sentences.chinese: 也可以在直角座標系下積分的。

sentences.english: Or I can use polar coordinates,and it works a little bit better that way.
sentences.chinese: 或者還是用極座標系，這比直角座標系更好。

sentences.english: If it is a square,I might want to use x,y coordinates.
sentences.chinese: 如果是個正方形，可以考慮用直角座標系。
